name: Race to the Space
description:
Its exam season and you (the student) need to find an empty space in the library to study, but beware someone set a bunch of traps on your way, with the help of your trust portal gun can you reach the spot in time, before someone else claims it?

Controls: 

- A : Move left

- D : Move Right

- Spacebar : Jump

- Mouse Left Button : Place Blue Portal
- Mouse Right Button : Place Orange Portal

- E : Pick up object

- ESC : if in game, credits or scoreboard returns to the main menu.

Game made by:
